item.description:
So it's going to be a bit cold when we walk today! Hey, it's winter and the air couldn't be (seem) cleaner or fresher. If we're lucky we'll even be welcomed by fresh falling snow as we walk. So bundle up and show up! We want you with us, not at Zumba class! See you all there at 5:30.

Any new ideas for dinner? We can always get 13% off the bill at the Athenian restaurant.

Depressing isn't it; 28 to 13! Ahhhhh those Patriots!!!! Oh well, there's always a next time.

 

Meet at the same place, the parking lot to the right of the concert track area. Where Sue's 50th sigh was posted sooo long ago! Hey, where is she anyway?
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot to the right of the concert park track area, just across the street from Heritage Ice Cream & Restaurant. My cell #; (603) 759-9876

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Walk & Talk Along the River!
